pkgmetadata.longdescription: # LinkML Schema AutomatorThis is a toolkit that assists with the generation and enhancement of [LinkML](https://linkml.io/linkml) schemas## Install```bashpip install schema-automator```## Command LineSee [CLI docs](https://linkml.io/schema-automator/cli)Generalizing:```bashschemauto generalize-tsv my-data.tsv > my-schema.yaml```Importing:```bashschemauto import-json-schema their.schema.json > my-schema.yaml```Annotating:```bashschemauto annotate-schema my-schema.yaml```## Full Documentation[linkml.io/schema-automator](https://linkml.io/schema-automator/)
